channel.title: Holy alien gun v2 update!
channel.description:
ok so this took me about idk an hour it has no prims all by hand and i worked realy hard on it. it did not come out the way i hoped but heres somthing i know its an epic fail but can you guys help me tell me stuff to add ill fix some things so ya here you go [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/i28qi0.jpg[/img]
ok so im taking some advice that was sent to me im changing it now i warn you im not done im fixing the handel and im gannna put a nukeler wast sighnns on the sides and im ganna put the cool people names in my list in my sig at the bottum and i will release after like v4 heres a pic [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/x45iqg.jpg[/img]

item.title: Holy alien gun v2 update!
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Lin isnt the brightest person. anything someone doesbthats of value to themselves isnt pointless. hes just ticked cuz not many ppl release, and he wont put time into modelling.

Read full topic

item.title: Holy alien gun v2 update!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Yea, but its all about models, so we will have ALLOT of noobs run though here looking for a quick add. I personally came here looking for a couple quick adds for my client, but I quickly figured out this section is 10 times better than server help or server downloads. Those are where i started, now im here. and proud to be here and learning a new skill.

Also, thanks for saying its best in a long time. It took me a while to convert the back and front on handle from being 2d to 3d. I’m working on a new blade for client since all of these models are “pointless” as Lin puts it.

Read full topic

item.title: Holy alien gun v2 update!
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:42, topic:280753”][quote author=jjones10 link=topic=370808.msg2866021#msg2866021 date=1247469272]

i like it

Thanks for pushing me out the door too
[/quote]
JJ, tbh the only reason I dont blow up anymore is because I found a girlfriend, she keeps me calm. It doesnt work for everybody, but just find what keep you calm and you’ll be good. :)[/quote]

Dude usually im chill. I can handle 1 or 2 idiots at a time. But in the past couple days there has been lots of Gravedigging, shitty posts and shitty models. Im not saying they are all bad but the best i’ve seen in a long time is the medieval blade!

I am just pissed cuz of all the bullshit going on in this section lately

Read full topic

You can’t model for SHIT
Your grammar is SHIT
You don’t take time for your models, you don’t take time to overview your posts.

item.title: Holy alien gun v2 update!
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

Okay first, take a class in grammar. Second, it is randomly colored. There is no significance to the color scheme. Third, it is just a horrible model. Please actualy take one hour or so to make a decent model. I would rather someone make a decent model from a trace, than a horrible model from scratch.

Thank You

item.title: Holy alien gun v2 update!
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

Sorry I tried to be nice about v1 but really v2 is like exactly the same. I could probably make a better alien gun in 2 minutes.

Actually i’m going to do that just to show you. It’s 8:53 now when I start, i’ll post time that I finish. Its 8:59 now and i’m done. I’ll upload a pic now. Btw I know it is shit, this is just to show that anyone can make a MUCH better model with pretty much no effort or creativity at all.

This is not to show off or anything, I wouldn’t post something as crap as that to show off. This is simply to show that anyone can make a better model than he did in less than 10 minutes.
Sorry homonoob but you really need to put some more effort into models. If you know you didn’t try then don’t post pics of it.

Read full topic
